title: How to Make a Triple Chocolate Milkshake

steps.headline: Pour about 8 ounces (240ml) of milk into the blender.
Add the chocolate ice cream.
steps.description: A scoop or two is usually sufficient but it's dependent on your taste preferences.

steps.headline: Blend the ice cream and milk ingredients together until it turns into a mushy mixture.
Add the two crumbled brownies.
steps.description: Make sure that the pieces are small enough for ease of blending. And add all the other ingredients listed.

steps.headline: Blend the ingredients again until the resulting milkshake is smooth.
Turn off the blender.
steps.description: Pour the triple chocolate milkshakes into glasses for each person.

steps.headline: Top the drinks off with whipped cream.
Drizzle chocolate syrup or sauce all over.
Add a chocolate straw or stick in the cup and enjoy.

text: Pour about 8 ounces (240ml) of milk into the blender.  Add the chocolate ice cream. A scoop or two is usually sufficient but it's dependent on your taste preferences. Blend the ice cream and milk ingredients together until it turns into a mushy mixture.  Add the two crumbled brownies. Make sure that the pieces are small enough for ease of blending. And add all the other ingredients listed. Blend the ingredients again until the resulting milkshake is smooth.  Turn off the blender. Pour the triple chocolate milkshakes into glasses for each person. Top the drinks off with whipped cream.  Drizzle chocolate syrup or sauce all over.  Add a chocolate straw or stick in the cup and enjoy.  Finished.
